GSD.product_version: versions from v4.13 to before v5.4.227
GSD.description:
ipv6: avoid use-after-free in ip6_fragment()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.227 by commit 6b6d3be3661bff2746cab26147bd629aa034e094, it was introduced in version v4.13 by commit 1758fd4688eb92c796e75bdb1d256dc558ef9581. For more details please see the references link.
